mod.name: Pan's Trinkets
mod.description: Adds trinkets, a new kind of rewards.

cards.name: Spent Lodestone
cards.description:
Put a card from your discard pile into your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Spent Lodestone+
cards.description:
Put a card from your discard pile into your hand.
Put a Lodestone in its place.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Unbound Fury
cards.description:
While in your hand :
You cannot play other Skills, Attacks are played an additional time.

cards.name: Unbound Fury+
cards.description:
Draw 1 card.
While in your hand :
You cannot play other Skills, Attacks are played an additional time.

cards.name: Ward
cards.description:
panstrinkets:Quickdraw.
Gain 6 Block.

cards.name: Ward+
cards.description:
panstrinkets:Quickdraw.
Gain 9 Block.

cards.name: Bag Of Daggers
cards.description:
panstrinkets:Quickdraw.
Deal 4 damage.
Return this card to your draw pile.

cards.name: Bag Of Daggers+
cards.description:
panstrinkets:Quickdraw.
Deal 6 damage.
Return this card to your draw pile.

cards.name: Corrupted Idol
cards.description:
While this is in your deck, you have 20 more Max HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Corrupted Idol+
cards.description:
While this is in your deck, you have 20 more Max HP.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Dark Ruby
cards.description:
Enemy loses 8 Strength this turn.
Add a Void to your discard pile.

cards.name: Dark Ruby+
cards.description:
Enemy loses 12 Strength this turn.
Add a Void to your discard pile.

cards.name: Dim Lantern
cards.description:
panstrinkets:Quickdraw.
Next turn, gain [E].

cards.name: Dim Lantern+
cards.description:
panstrinkets:Quickdraw .
Next turn, gain [E] [E].

cards.name: Explosive Trap
cards.description:
Innate. Ethereal.
Next time you take damage, deal 15 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Explosive Trap+
cards.description:
Innate. Ethereal.
Next time you take damage, deal 21 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Golden Feather
cards.description:
Upgrade all cards in your draw pile OR your discard pile for the rest of combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Golden Feather+
cards.description:
Upgrade all cards in your hand, and in your draw pile OR your discard pile for the rest of combat.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Kaleidoscope
cards.description: At the start of your turn, add a random panstrinkets:Illusory card of any color in your hand.

cards.name: Kaleidoscope+
cards.description: At the start of your turn, add a random panstrinkets:Illusory card of any color in your hand.

cards.name: Lodestone
cards.description:
Put a card from your draw pile into your hand.
Put a Spent Lodestone in its place.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Lodestone+
cards.description:
Put a card from your draw pile into your hand.
Put a Spent Lodestone+ in its place.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Mirror Shield
cards.description:
Gain 12 Block.
Gain 1 Artifact.
Exhaust

cards.name: Mirror Shield+
cards.description:
Gain 12 Block.
Gain 2 Artifact.
Exhaust

cards.name: Orichalcum Armor
cards.description:
Gain 5 Block.
If this card is in your deck, gain 2 Block at the end of your turn.

cards.name: Orichalcum Armor+
cards.description:
Gain 5 Block.
If this card is in your deck, gain 3 Block at the end of your turn.

cards.name: Runic Boomerang
cards.description:
The next card you play goes back to your hand.
Exhaust

cards.name: Runic Boomerang+
cards.description:
Retain.
The next card you play go back to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Sapphire Locket
cards.description:
Innate. Ethereal.
Draw a random power from your draw pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Sapphire Locket+
cards.description:
Innate. Ethereal.
panstrinkets:Quickdraw.
Draw a random power from your draw pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Shielding Talisman
cards.description: Shuffle 2 Wards into your draw pile.

cards.name: Shielding Talisman+
cards.description: Shuffle 3 Wards into your draw pile.

cards.name: Soothing Balm
cards.description:
panstrinkets:Quickdraw.
Exhaust ALL your Status cards.

cards.name: Soothing Balm+
cards.description:
Retain. panstrinkets:Quickdraw.
Exhaust ALL your Status cards.

cards.name: The Plan
cards.description:
Draw 3 cards.
They are Retained this turn.

cards.name: The Plan+
cards.description:
Draw 4 cards.
They are Retained this turn.

cards.name: Universal Dictionary
cards.description:
panstrinkets:Large.
Draw 6 cards.

cards.name: Universal Dictionary+
cards.description:
panstrinkets:Large.
Draw 6 cards.

cards.name: Worn Whetstone
cards.description:
Gain 2 Strength.
panstrinkets:Large.

cards.name: Worn Whetstone+
cards.description:
Gain 3 Strength.
panstrinkets:Large.

cards.name: Amorphous Matter
cards.description: Choose a random trinket to add to your hand. It is panstrinkets:Illusory.

cards.name: Amorphous Matter+
cards.description: Choose a random trinket to add to your hand. It is panstrinkets:Illusory and Upgraded.

cards.name: Echo Chamber
cards.description: Every 5th card played is played an additional time.

cards.name: Echo Chamber+
cards.description: Every 5th card played is played an additional time.

cards.name: Fang Hammer
cards.description:
Deal 14 damage.
If Fatal, heal HP equal to unblocked damage dealt.

cards.name: Fang Hammer+
cards.description:
Deal 18 damage.
If Fatal, heal HP equal to unblocked damage dealt.

cards.name: Hungry Coin
cards.description: Lose 10 Gold. Deal 3 damage. Permanently increase this card's damage by 3.

cards.name: Hungry Coin+
cards.description: Lose 10 Gold. Deal 3 damage. Permanently increase this card's damage by 5.

cards.name: Ornate Mirror
cards.description:
Choose a card that isn't Fleeting in your hand. Add a copy of it to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Ornate Mirror+
cards.description:
Choose a card that isn't Fleeting in your hand. Place copy of it in your hand. It costs 1 less [E] this turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Sealed Box
cards.description:
Gain 75 gold.
Lose 2 Max Weight.
Fleeting.

cards.name: Sealed Box+
cards.description:
Gain 150 gold.
Lose 2 Max Weight.
Fleeting.

cards.name: Shard of Madness
cards.description:
Permanently reduce the cost of a card in hand to 0.
Lose 4 Max Weight.
Fleeting.

cards.name: Shard of Madness+
cards.description:
Permanently reduce the cost of a card in hand to 0.
Lose 2 Max Weight.
Fleeting.

cards.name: Symbol of Fury
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Shuffle an Unbound Fury into your draw pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Symbol of Fury+
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Shuffle an Unbound Fury+ into your draw pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Wraith Cloak
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Gain 1 Intangible.

cards.name: Wraith Cloak+
cards.description: Gain 1 Intangible.

keywords.name: Panstrinkets:Durability
keywords.description: Whenever you play this card, lose 1 durability. When it reaches 0, remove this card from your deck.

keywords.name: Panstrinkets:Illusory
keywords.description: Illusory cards are exhausted when you play them, or at the end of your turn if they are in your hand.

keywords.name: Panstrinkets:Large
keywords.description: When drawn, put a random card other than this one from your hand on the top of your draw pile.

keywords.name: Multiword Keyword
keywords.description: Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.

keywords.name: Panstrinkets:Quickdraw
keywords.description: Whenever you draw this card, draw one card.

keywords.name: Panstrinkets:Shifting
keywords.description: When drawn or played, replace this card with a random Shifting trinket

keywords.name: Panstrinkets:Weight
keywords.description: You can only carry trinkets of a total weight lower than 10.

keywords.name: Panstrinkets:keyword
keywords.description: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
